name: HTMLSelectElement.item
description: The HTMLSelectElement.item() method returns the Element corresponding to the HTMLOptionElement whose position in the options list corresponds to the index given in the parameter, or null if there are none.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLSelectElement.item()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLSelectElement.item()' in the 'HTML5' specification.
